name: CorporateTower Super Alpha
description:
WHAT DOESN'T WORK RIGHT

  • enemy AI is really limited, hearing doesn't work right for some reason
  • Dungeon zone's camera can lag the game and also vibrates a lot

WHAT ISN'T EVEN THERE YET

  • turn based combat
  • random generated dungeons (almost there, just not in a playable state)

WHAT IS THERE

  • Regular scenes with the gang
  • movement
  • super simple combat
  • manually made dungeon to demonstrate what they will (hopefully) end up like
